long_description: The Gregory Z40 Pack is built for your quick overnight and general all-mountain adventures. Throw in your camping gear, climbing gear or anything else you may need for an escape to the mountains. Ventilated back panel and harness with wrap-over padding on the hipbelt offer comfort and stability for the long haul. Die-cut foam on the harness and hipbelt adds breathability and decreases weight. CrossFlo(TM) DTS Suspension provides cooling airflow across the back without sacrificing load transfer; wire X-Frame transfers load weight to the lumbar pad and hipbelt. Top-loading main compartment features a quick-draw closure and floating top lid with 2 pockets and key clip; U-shaped front zipper makes it easy to access the pack's depths. Interior sleeve with port accommodates a hydration reservoir (sold separately). Front bucket pocket and zippered pocket, 2 exterior stretch water bottle pockets and dual hipbelt pockets make it easy to organize and access essentials. The Gregory Z40 Pack features hideaway axe/trekking pole loops with secure attachments, side/bottom compression straps and an integrated, color-matched rain cover.
short_description: The Gregory Z40 Pack is built for your quick overnight and general all-mountain adventures. Throw in your camping gear, climbing gear or anything else you may need for an escape to the mountains.
